archetype_name: Family Low-Carb Weeknight Bowls & Wraps (15–30, Mild)
name: Mild Shawarma Chicken Cauliflower Wraps
description: Quick, low-carb wraps with skillet-cooked shawarma chicken, crisp veggies, and a lemon-garlic yogurt sauce. Family-friendly with mild seasoning.
prep_steps: Pat dry and slice chicken thighs into thin strips.
In a bowl, combine shawarma paste with olive oil.
Shred or tear lettuce into wrap-sized pieces.
In a small bowl, mix yogurt, minced garlic, a big pinch of salt, black pepper, and juice from half the lemon; cut remaining lemon into wedges.
Set oven to low (about 160–175°C / 325–350°F) to gently warm cauliflower wrap just before serving.
cook_steps: Toss chicken thigh strips in the shawarma paste mixture until coated.
Heat a large skillet over medium-high on the stovetop.
Cook chicken in a single layer 5–7 minutes, stirring once or twice, until browned and cooked through; season with a pinch of salt and black pepper.
While chicken cooks, place cauliflower wrap on a baking sheet and warm in the oven 2–3 minutes until pliable (do not crisp).
Build wraps: layer lettuce on warm cauliflower wrap, add chicken, tomatoes, and cucumber.
Spoon on lemon-garlic yogurt sauce and serve with lemon wedges.

ingredients.preparation: half juiced, half cut into wedges
